segments.text: I'm fine thanks . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm okay . What are you doing these days ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not a lot , actually . Busy at work of course - we've got a big project coming up in Malaysia . I may have to go to KL in a few weeks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great . When are you starting ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Probably in a week or two . I'll let you know .
segments.speaker: S2
